runs.comm: angling away and nips away after pitching, short of a good length and Jayawardene lets it go
down the leg side and easy pickings for Jayawardene, Gul threw himself to his right at fine leg but was unable to stop it, Jayawardene glanced it down fine, nicely done
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and drops it down into the leg side in front of the bowler
shortish on leg stump, turns it behind square leg for a single
short of a good length, rocks back does Dilshan and pats it in front of extra cover
short of a good length and Dilshan moves away a hint to play his favourite shot, the cut, misses, just goes past the outside edge
pushed it full outside off, Jayawardene times it superbly, a firm push and it races between cover and point, Afridi gives chase but they pick up three
flat just outside off and Dilshan pushes it straight to cover
fired in quick outside off, flat and quicker, Dilshan has enough room to slash it through point for a boundary, he isn't going to spare those
floating it on middle, slower through the air this time, pushed towards extra cover, Jayawardene sends Dilshan back
slightly short on middle and off this time, no turn for Hasan thus far, Dilshan rocks back and pushes to cover
goes on straight and Dilshan defends it back towards the bowler
sliding away from the off stump, not a wide but close, Jayawardene lets that one go through
beaten, lovely delivery, short of a good length on the off and moves away after pitching to just go past the outside edge as Jayawardene moved back to defend, bowled at 139.4 kmph
edged, a thick outside edge, landing on a good length and moved away, Jayawardene kept it down by playing it with soft hands, gets a single to third man, big puff of dust as the ball pitched, hmmm
short and good carry this time, slashes hard does Dilshan, tries to smack it over point but can't make contact
shortish and it's chopped from the crease towards point, stayed on the crease, not much width
goodish length, gets forward and dabs it in front of cover to steal a quick single

that came through quick from round the wicket and Dilshan was cramped for room as he tried to play the cut, was straight on middle and the shot wasn't on, got an inside edge onto the pads and it didn't miss the stumps by much
a bit of flight and it's pushed down to mid-on for a single
superbly done, tossed up this time, Jayawardene moved across, positioned himself perfectly and swept it hard over square leg for a boundary
kept a little low this time, width from Hasan, perhaps a negligible amount of turn on that one, cut straight to point, had to reach for it
will be disappointed he missed out there, short and wide but it's cut to point again
angling it in towards middle and it's turned into the leg side for a single
ooh, fishing for one outside off, short of a good length and he was looking to open the face there but missed
a bit of frustration from Jayawardene, charged out before it was delivered, Tanvir slowed it up, was a cutter and Jayawardene swung at it awkwardly, mistimed it wide of mid-on for a single
drops that short on middle, Dilshan withdrew from a pull there, not high enough to be called a wide, one for the over
too wide this time, way too wide outside off and Dilshan didn't want to reach for it, called a wide
short and wide and Dilshan goes at it really hard, misses again, wanted to clear point there, dot ball again
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it towards point

dropped, would be a little unfair to call it that, Dilshan flirted with that as it moved away after pitching, tried to open the face and got an edge, Kamran Akmal dived full length to his right and got a glove to it, but couldn't hold on
Ajmal starts poorly, short on middle and leg, long hop and Jayawardene helps it past short fine for a boundary
More runs, Jayawardene went for the reverse-sweep and missed, it pitched on middle and turned down the leg side, beat the keeper as well, byes
flatter on the off stump, a bit of inward turn and it's defended into the leg side
Jayawardene gets outside the line to sweep that one square and Akmal appeals, outside the line there
ooh, floated, some air on that and it turned in from outside off, Jayawardene was trying to open the face and guide that behind point, missed
the reverse-sweep works this time, on middle and some turn as well but he's made up his mind, gets it firmly past point for a boundary
Starts off with a short ball, a bit of away turn, slapped towards deep cover for a single
big turn, massive turn, there was bounce as well, Jayawardene opted out of the cut, not a wide though
turn again and it goes past the outside edge, flat and on a good length outside off, turns away as he comes forward to defend
good cricket, this, Jayawardene responds by reverse-pulling that over point, two fielders stationed there, it turns and he hits it with the turn
defended in front of cover to steal a quick single, this one went on straight
that one slid down the leg side, Dilshan was trying to work it fine, probably clipped his thigh before Akmal fumbled it
pushed it straight, no turn for him yet, Jayawardene moved away to cut it from middle towards point, a touch risky there
aah, was looking to loft that over extra cover, there was some flight there but he mistimed it to long-off
frustration for Dilshan, slowed it up did Hasan, got it to turn away this time, tried to cut did Dilshan and missed, was not happy
eases that off the front foot towards long-off for a single
quicker one bowled short on the off, defended wide of cover for a single
pushed it quick on the off, pushes that through cover for a single in the deep
shortish outside off, cut away towards deep point, to the left of deep point for a couple of runs
a touch short there and some turn too, chopped past point for a single
ooh, trying to be cheeky, shortish outside off, wanted to use the pace to delicately play it past short third, missed
tossed up, full and wide and he smashed that clean over extra cover for a boundary, slower but wide
turns away and goes past the outside edge, Jayawardene was looking to repeat the shot but it kept a little low this time, they get a bye however
pushed it quick but on a length to Dilshan, driven to long-off for a single

run-out attempt, angling in towards middle, defended it wide of Malik at cover and called for a single, Malik ran in, collected it well and under-armed it towards the stumps at the striker's end, scores a direct hit but Jayawardene stretched and made it in
he's played that shot well today, a reverse-sweep cover point, was bowled on leg but Jayawardene had made up his mind
gets this one over short fine, paddled over that fielder, some turn away from the bat but he's an enterprising batsman is Jayawardene, picked it nicely for a couple more
turns away and he drives it hard but straight to Malik at extra cover, took it on the half-volley, fell just short
quicker ball slightly short outside off, late-cut but straight to short third man
Mahela's going well, long-off is a little wide and he spotted that, came down the track and just smacked that to long-off's left, over the bowler's head, for a boundary
knocked away for a single into the off side
the scoop didn't work this time, moved across this time to get it over short fine but it appeared to come off the bottom of the hand and went straight to that fielder, Raza Hasan
Confident start for Sanga, tossed up, landed full outside off and he drilled that hard between long-on and deep midwicket, boundary first up
attacking approach first up, sweeps this square from outside off for a single past square leg
ooh, was the googly it seemed, fired in straight on middle, Dilshan made a bit of room but no way he was going to cut that, defended it into the off side
appeal for lbw, but that seemed to be missing leg, fired in on leg stump but it didn't turn, the line would have taken it past leg as Dilshan tried to play across
short outside off and Sanga continues to attack, though this shot was on, turned away and he used that to cut it past the diving point
uppish but in the gap, was targeting to play it past extra cover, got it wide of long-off, Imran Nazir fumbles in the deep and that allows Sanga to come back for two, Ajmal;s not happy
angling in, turning away, defended this time towards point, no single on offer there

lovely shot, tossed up, lands on a length on the off stump and drives that uppishly, slightly inside out, over extra cover for a boundary, with the turn, Hafeez doesn't have an explanation for that, just held his hand up
driven uppishly again, but this time towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, turns it past square leg for a single
a reverse-jab wide of extra cover for a single
angling in from round the wicket towards middle, defended into the leg side

beaten by the turn, appeal for a stumping, pushed it flatter and got it to turn away after pitching, Sanga was into the drive as it went past him, Akmal collected and took off the bails but Sanga's foot never left the ground there
down the leg side, flat down the leg side, Sanga moved across to punish that square, missed but it's a wide
went at that one hard, on middle and he half-pulled that through midwicket for a couple of runs

he's holed out, well taken by Malik at long-on, didn't connect well there, he'd made up his mind, came down the track and Hafeez bowled it slightly wide of off, Sanga had to reach it as he tried to drag it over the bowler's head, found long-on, didn't get the distance, Malik moved a little to his right to grab that but it was a pressure catch of sorts, Sanga was going well
turns in from the off stump, played wide of square leg into the deep for a single
short of a length outside off, chopped towards short third man for a single
Mendis gets across as Afridi bowls from round the wicket, turned past square leg for a single
poor ball from Afridi, full toss and Dilshan finally dispatches one, smashed it hard over midwicket to pick the gap for a one bounce four
quicker, bowled full on middle, drives it back to the bowler
angling in towards middle and he meets that with a straight bat, cautiously played back
closes the face and turns it through the vacant midwicket region for a couple of runs, Afridi has to gather it and they run well to complete the second
the turn almost beats him there, angling in towards middle and shoots away sharply, Mendis gets a thick outside edge to short third, a single
shortish outside off, chopped towards point for a single
Jeevan plays that pre-meditated, reverse, slog-swept over extra cover to find the gap, landed on a length outside off and he connected well
wanted to cut that but there was no room, angling in towards middle, drops it towards point
tossed up on the off, almost yorker length as it lands, dug out back to the bowler
uppish, landed fullish, squeezed uppishly wide of long-off but a single is all they'll get, 100 up
beaten, good stuff first up, short of a good length and gets it to move away and it goes past Mendis' outside edge
misses again, two dot balls, short and wide and he wanted to cut that past point, didn't connect
gets a couple of runs as he moves across to clip that over square leg
what a superb over this is, short of a good length, gets on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
ooh, just evades the outstretched left arm of midwicket, didn't connect on the pull, short and he just managed to get it over Tanvir, two more
a bouncer, banged it short on middle but it's called a wide, too high and the umpire calls it a wide
two more as he pulls that slower one over midwicket, deep midwicket runs across to collect it but can't prevent them from taking two
or maybe not, shortish on the off, just gets the single, pushes it through cover for a single
tries to sweep that but mistimes it towards square leg for a single
Ajmal's been a little off the mark today, goes round the wicket, short on middle and leg and Dilshan helps it past the diving Gul at short fine for a boundary
makes a bit of room to punch that shortish delivery to long-off for a single
went for the slog-sweep but that was quick and almost in the blockhole, could only dig it back to the bowler
tried to sweep that past Raza Hasan at short fine but couldn't get it past him, no single
pitched on a good length outside off and Dilshan swings wildly and misses
low full toss on the off and he could only drag it to midwicket, just the single
yorker outside off and Mendis can't dig it out, excellent death bowling this, missed it and went through to the keeper

given out lbw, Mendis moved across to clip it square, pitched on middle and off, Mendis missed as he tried to play the shot, was trapped in front of the off stump, the umpire wants to check if it was a no-ball and replays show Gul has bowled a no-ball, not sure there was any part of the foot behind the line as it landed
on a good length and he swings hard but can only get it as far as long-on, just the single
Dilshan goes! Almost yorker length and he failed to get it away towards midwicket as he was trying to do, seemed to strike him in line with leg stump and Taufel gave it out
Oh Gul, superb stuff, yorker length and Thisara had no answer against that one, failed to dig it out, couldn't get his bat down in time and it didn't miss the leg stump by much
stumped, stumped off a wide, Mendis comes down the track and that was bowled wide, it spun away further and he failed to reach it, Akmal did the rest
on middle and leg, turns it through square leg into the deep for a single
short and turns away, slaps it wide of long-off, just the single in the end as Malik cuts it off in the deep
slog-sweep, does it with the turn, finds Umar Gul at deep midwicket, on the bounce
mistimed again, Perera chases that quick one, turns away and he can only knock it back to the bowler
pushed quick and pushed full outside off, drilled towards long-off for a single, Malik again does well in the deep
comes down the track and pushes it wide of Malik, who runs forward and returns a good throw to the non-striker's end to keep them to a single
edged and four, Mathews made a bit of room to play that past point, got a thick edge to the third-man boundary
almost finds the yorker, Mathews dug it out towards extra cover for just the single

smashed back, pitched on a length and Perera has bludgeoned that over the bowler's head, Gul did well to duck under that one and Umar Akmal tried hard from long-on to dive to his right but couldn't stop it
pitched up outside off and with mid-off inside the circle that's not the ideal line, Perera manages to chip that over the fielder for another boundary
oh, Perera will feel he missed out there, full toss and he failed to pull that, mistimed it wide of midwicket for just the single, not above the waist
length ball and Mathews digs that out wide of long-off for a couple of runs
